title: HELP,! BLACK SCREEN ALWAYS OCCURS WHEN I OPEN STORE

replies.body:
Have the same exact problem and followed and tried everything on these two 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753044-Store-Error-Store-appears-blank-black-or-empty
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-

But my problem has still not been resolved
